member.name: M:SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.PFSNet.R.Base.Quantile(System.Double[],System.Double)
member.summary: The generic function quantile produces sample quantiles corresponding to the given probabilities. The smallest observation corresponds to a probability of 0 and the largest to a probability of 1.
member.param: numeric vector whose sample quantiles are wanted, or an object of a class for which a method has been defined (see also ‘details’). NA and NaN values are not allowed in numeric vectors unless na.rm is TRUE.
numeric vector of probabilities with values in [0,1]. (Values up to 2e-14 outside that range are accepted and moved to the nearby endpoint.)

member.name: M:SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.PFSNet.R.Base.Sample``1(``0[],System.Int32)
member.summary: sample.int(n, size = n, replace = FALSE, prob = NULL) sample takes a sample of the specified size from the elements of x using either with or without replacement.

member.name: M:SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.PFSNet.R.Graph.Data.Frame(SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.PFSNet.DataStructure.GraphEdge[],System.Boolean,Microsoft.VisualBasic.Data.csv.DocumentStream.DataFrame)
member.summary: This function creates an igraph graph from one or two data frames containing the (symbolic) edge list and edge/vertex attributes.
member.param: A data frame containing a symbolic edge list in the first two columns. Additional columns are considered as edge attributes.

If vertices is NULL, then the first two columns of d are used as a symbolic edge list and additional columns as edge attributes. The names of the attributes are taken from the names of the columns. If vertices is not NULL, then it must be a data frame giving vertex metadata. The first column of vertices is assumed to contain symbolic vertex names, this will be added to the graphs as the ‘name’ vertex attribute. Other columns will be added as additional vertex attributes. If vertices is not NULL then the symbolic edge list given in d is checked to contain only vertex names listed in vertices. Typically, the data frames are exported from some speadsheat software like Excel and are imported into R via read.table, read.delim or read.csv.

member.name: M:SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.PFSNet.R.Graph.Data.simplify(SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.PFSNet.DataStructure.PFSNetGraph)
member.summary:
simplify(graph, remove.multiple = TRUE, remove.loops = TRUE, edge.attr.comb = getIgraphOpt("edge.attr.comb")) is.simple(graph)
Simple graphs are graphs which do not contain loop and multiple edges.
A loop edge is an edge for which the two endpoints are the same vertex. Two edges are multiple edges if they have exactly the same two endpoints (for directed graphs order does matter). A graph is simple is it does not contain loop edges and multiple edges.
is.simple checks whether a graph is simple.
simplify removes the loop and/or multiple edges from a graph. If both remove.loops and remove.multiple are TRUE the function returns a simple graph.
member.returns: A new graph object with the edges deleted.

member.name: T:SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.PFSNet.PFSNet
member.summary: Implements the pfsnet algorithm to calculates the significant and consist cellular network between two types of mutations. (计算两种突变体的共有的表型变化的PfsNET算法)

member.name: T:SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.PFSNet.PFSNet.PFSNetEvaluateHandle
member.summary: The united PfsNET evaluate interface handler for the R version scripting engine and VisualBasic evaluation engine. (R版本和VB版本的计算函数的统一接口(好像R的版本不能够并行化))
member.param: The expression data file of mutation for one phenotype.(基因表达数据1)
The expression data file of mutation for another phenotype.(基因表达数据2)
The gene interaction relationship table.(基因互作关系列表)
The sub network screening cutoff value.(子网络基因筛选阈值)
The upbound value of the fuzzy weight calculation.(模糊权重计算上限)
The lower bound value of the fuzzy weight calculation.(模糊权重计算下限)
The hypothesis testing count of the PfsNET calculation sub network.(假设检验的统计次数)

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.PFSNet.PFSNet.OriginalRAlgorithm
M:SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.PFSNet.PFSNet.computew1(SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.PFSNet.DataStructure.DataFrameRow[],System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary:
```R ranks<-apply(expr,2,function(x){ rank(x)/length(x) }) ```
apply函数之中的MARGIN参数的含义： MARGIN a vector giving the subscripts which the function will be applied over. E.g., for a matrix 1 indicates rows, 2 indicates columns, c(1, 2) indicates rows and columns. Where X has named dimnames, it can be a character vector selecting dimension names. 即上述的R函数是对矩阵之中的每一列进行计算

member.name: M:SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.PFSNet.PFSNet.Internal_getFuzzyWeight(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: 计算模糊权重

member.name: M:SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.PFSNet.PFSNet.computegenelist(SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.PFSNet.DataStructure.DataFrameRow[],System.Double)
member.summary:
```R list.mask<-apply(w,1,function(x){ sum(x,na.rm=T)/sum(!is.na(x)) >= beta }) list(gl=rownames(w)[list.mask]) ```
apply函数是对行进行统计的
函数返回行的编号的列表
